scripts.build: node build.js && marp output/presentation.output.md -o output/presentation.html --allow-local-files --html --theme presentation-styles.css
scripts.export:pdf: npm run build && marp output/presentation.output.md --pdf -o output/presentation.pdf --allow-local-files --theme presentation-styles.css
scripts.export:pptx: npm run build && marp output/presentation.output.md --pptx -o output/presentation.pptx --allow-local-files --theme presentation-styles.css
